page.title: 18RECREATION IN DEEPCAR
page.content: Deepcar has the only{golf course}in the area, with 15 holes at present. There is rock climbing on{Wharncliffe {Crags}and sailing and}fishing on {Morehall Reservoir. Tin Mill Dam}also provides fine fishing, stocked with carp, perch, roach, tench and bream. The main centre for recreation is the {Village Hall}with a monthly barn dance, two dancing classes, bridge club, amateur football club, Brownies, Guides, and a busy youth club. The latter's activities include snooker, table tennis, football and hockey. It also organises camping weekends and sporting events with other youth clubs outside the area.{Parsonage Farm}has 2 new football pitches and changing facilities beside an area used for galas.{Lowood W.M.C.}and pubs cater for snooker, pool and darts. Many people use Stocksbridge Sports Centre.
